Member Function Documentation

virtual bool DRMPlugin::ContentInfoManager::GetContentInfo (  IXMLElement *  xmlDoc,
std::string &  info
)  [pure virtual]
 

Create DRM content information.

Use the information provided in the given XML document. See the specific manager documentation for the correct format of the XML document.

Generally, for all content info managers, mandatory tags in the XML file are:

  • ROOT.ContentTitle

Here follows an example of a correctly formatted XML document.

      <ROOT>
       <ContentTitle>test30.mp4.track1</ContentTitle>
      </ROOT>

Parameters:
xmlDoc XML document containing necessary information for creating content info.
info output, newly created content info.
Returns:
Boolean indicating success or failure.
